name: 9Lives (Ragnarok9x)
description:
9Lives is a game I'm working on as a passion project. It started out with the desire to create a melee action dungeon crawler, and evolved to include customization as well!

As updates come out, I will be improving the gameplay, (hopefully) improving the assets, and adding more customization options to the player cat!

Please try out my game, and check out my devlog series on youtube!

https://www.youtube.com/Ragnarok9x

CONTROLS:

W = Up

A = Left

S = Down

D = Right

R = Restart

E = Interact

X = Statmenu

LMB  = Swing

RMB = Throw

KNOWN BUGS:

When spawning in a shop, the starting weapon must be paid for.

Some collision issues with the tail.

Knockback from the player weapon gets enemies (especially bosses) stuck in walls.

Please let me know if you find any bugs, and I'll get right to work on them! Thanks!

Thank you for downloading, and thank you for following the development of 9Lives.
